documentation.text: @dev Returns the balance of the `who` address.

@dev Transfers `value` tokens from `msg.sender` to `to` address
 and returns `true` on success.

@dev Transfers `value` tokens from `msg.sender` to `to` address with `data` parameter
 and returns `true` on success.
@dev Event that is fired on successful transfer.

@dev Additional event that is fired on successful transfer and logs transfer metadata,
      this event is implemented to keep Transfer event compatible with ERC20.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Event that is fired on successful transfer.

TransferData(bytes).details: Additional event that is fired on successful transfer and logs transfer metadata,      this event is implemented to keep Transfer event compatible with ERC20.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the balance of the `who` address.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers `value` tokens from `msg.sender` to `to` address and returns `true` on success.

transfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: Transfers `value` tokens from `msg.sender` to `to` address with `data` parameter and returns `true` on success.
